alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:48PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 230 PM MST... At 146 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lost Dutchman State Park, or near Apache Junction, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and very heavy rainfall expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Very heavy rainfall in a short period of time could produce localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Superstition Mountains, Gold Camp, Kings Ranch, Lost Dutchman State Park and Goldfield. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 199 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior
